examples: You'll soon be feeling your old self again (= feeling well or happy again).
Pronto volverá a sentirse como antes (= sentirse bien o feliz de nuevo).
He's not his usual happy self this morning.
No es su yo feliz habitual esta mañana.
Only with a few people could she be her real self (= show what she was really like rather than what she pretended to be).
Solo con unas pocas personas podría ser ella misma (= mostrar cómo era realmente en lugar de lo que pretendía ser).
his private/professional self (= how he behaves at home/work)
su yo privado / profesional (= cómo se comporta en casa / trabajo)
